name: Metanoia First Collectible NFT
description:
This is usually the first NFT gift given to participants of Metanoia who are new to Metanoia's ecosystem, for on-boarding & being part of Metanoia's community. 
For many, this is also likely the very first NFT that they have ever owned and the first time they have stepped into the web3 space. 
As a collectible, it confers unknown benefits but might be useful in the future.
